Network Security Tools

CyberChef

Swiss Army Knife for encoded information: does conversions, decryption, hashing, everything. Very handy!

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef

Snoopy Logger

https://github.com/a2o/snoopy logs all shell commands to syslog not useful for forensics, because it can be bypassed, but useful to audit what has happened manually and if an attacker doesnâ€™t know its there.

VULNREPORT

http://vulnreport.io/

automation and management platform for penetration tests and security audits
